description.en: I was a public official who worked part-time to survive. I was knocked out by a speeding car while making deliveries in the middle of the night. I have a strong memory of dying prematurely in a hit-and-run. “…I’m Jo Hwi?” At some point, I became the second son of the collapsing Jo Ga-cheol Clan. This family has neither the authority to drop a flying bird nor the power to carry out one’s will. There is only an enormous amount of debt that can annihilate the entire family. There’s only one way out! “Father, please pass the Jo Ga-cheol Clan on to me.” The story of a successful modern man who has to utilize all the knowledge and experience of a public official begins now!!

altTitles.ja: マネマネ にちにち

description.en: In a certain school lies a certain club and its three managers. Though unremarkable, days that can't be found anywhere else have begun! Drawn by Yamamoto Souichiro is a brand new Sports ground youth story!
description.fr: Dans une certaine lycée se trouve un certain club et ses trois managers. Bien qu'anodins, des jours comme on n'en trouve nulle part ailleurs voient le jour ! Dessiné par Yamamoto Souichiro : une toute nouvelle histoire de jeunesse sur le thème du sport !
description.tl: Nakatakda sa beysbol klab ng isang hayskul, ito ay isang "kwentong pagdadalaga sa gilid," na nakatuon sa tatlong tagapamahala ng koponan na may napakaibang mga personalidad: si Nagisa, na halos hindi alam ang mga patakaran ng beysbol; si Ichinose, isang magarbo na gyaru; at si Himemiya, ang tahimik na babae na may nakakagulat na masamang pag-uugali.
description.vi: Slice of life của ba em quản lí CLB thể thao ở một trường cao trung nào đó... Để xem có gì hay!
description.pt-br: Numa determinada escola reside um determinado clube e as suas três ajudantes. Embora normais, dias que não podem ser encontrados em nenhum outro lugar começaram! Desenhado por Yamamoto Souichirou, é uma nova história juvenil de campo esportivo!

description.en:
According to the god Origin's prophecy, the girl Flum was chosen to be one of the members of the party that were foretold to defeat the Demon Lord. Everyone already had achievements to their name, as well as the strength to back them up. However, only Flum did not possess any combat prowess, and all of her stats were 0 due to her rare affinity. While being constantly berated, she continued to put great efforts to be useful to the heroes.     

Until one day, she was tricked by one of the party members who said that she “was not necessary anymore” and sold off to a slave trader. Flum was forced to live as a slave, locked away and barely fed. There she encountered a “cursed sword” and realized the true power of her rare affinity, “Reversal.”   The girl, who acquired the power to fight, was indifferent to the Demon Lord and decided to live peacefully as an adventurer alongside a slave girl she met.    

——This is a story of one girl who continued to crawl up from the very bottom in order to regain her peaceful everyday life.

description.en: A 32-year-old single mother is told by her neighbor, a university student around 20, that he likes her. Thing is… he's not particularly *shy* about why he likes her.
description.ru: 20 летний студент университета, говорит 32-летней матери-одиночки, что она ему нравится . Дело в том... Что он не особенно стесняется того, почему она ему нравится.
description.uk:
20-річний студент зізнався у коханні своїй 32-річній сусідці матері-одиначці. Справа в тому... Що він зовсім не *соромиться* розказувати про те, чому закоханий у неї.

[Офіційно] прохання виразити свої думки та враження від манґи у [цьому опитуванні.](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf2Y999w7eCjYHgHquZcZ50TxXPcJeY1XjTsWxelzhSDEPsKw/viewform)
description.vi: Shiraishi Hanano là một người phụ nữ 32 tuổi. Một ngày nọ, cô nhận được lời tỏ tình từ người hàng xóm Yoshio-kun, một sinh viên đại học. Cậu ta khăng khăng muốn cưới cô ấy làm vợ, thậm chí không quan tâm cả việc cô ấy đã từng kết hôn hay có một đứa con gái
description.pt-br:
Uma mãe solteira de 32 anos ouve de seu vizinho, um estudante universitário de cerca de 20, que ele gosta dela. A coisa é… ele não é particularmente tímido sobre por que gosta dela.  
  
[Oficial] Por favor, responda [this survey](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf2Y999w7eCjYHgHquZcZ50TxXPcJeY1XjTsWxelzhSDEPsKw/viewform) para dar seus pensamentos e impressões!

description.en: The manga will focus on the character Koharu Hidaka, who is a middle school teacher close to 30 years old in 2007.
description.es-la: Año 2007, Hidaka Koharu ahora es maestra de secundaria y a punto de alcanzar los 30 años. Sin novio y sin perspectivas para el futuro. Balanceándose entre el trabajo y la búsqueda de matrimonio, el corazón de esta chica madura es como un Kikouken.

title.en: My Girlfriend Always Glares at Me

altTitles.ja: ずっと睨んでくる彼女

altTitles.en: I Reincarnated as a Legendary Surgeon

description.en:
Because of being just, before even becoming specialist, Jisoo Han, a 3rd year of general surgery, has died.
Was it an angel, demon, or some unknown system of the world? Because of his good deeds, he got a chance to live again.
But he was resurrected as a dead man who was killed by mountain bandits. But this body… Is it the body of a great legendary surgeon?!
A generation of heroes with an endless battle, about in the year 200. As a great legendary surgeon of the 200’s, he tries to stand up to it……
An unexpected and extraordinary journey of a young surgeon, who fell into the world of Romance of the Three Kingdoms, has began!

---

**Links:**
- [Original Webtoon (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%99%94%ED%83%80%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%9C-%EC%99%B8%EA%B3%BC%EC%9D%98%EC%82%AC/2736)
description.fr:
Était-ce un ange, un démon ou autre chose qui m'a ressuscité ?
Jisoo Han, un major de troisième année en chirurgie générale, a perdu la vie en raison de sa personnalité droite. Cependant, grâce aux bonnes actions qu'il a faites dans sa vie, il a été ressuscité dans le corps d'un homme mort qui a été tué par des bandits de montagne. Mais ce corps… Est-ce le corps d'un grand chirurgien légendaire ?! Maintenant, dans l'ère des Trois Royaumes de guerres et de héros [CE 200]. Jisoo essaie de survivre et de se tenir debout en tant que chirurgien légendaire ……
Le voyage inattendu et extraordinaire d'un jeune chirurgien, tombé dans l'ère des Trois Royaumes, a commencé !
description.ko:
정의로운 성격 때문에 전문의는 커녕, 목숨까지 잃은 일반외과 전공 3년차 한진수.

천사인가, 악마인가, 아님 알 수 없는 시스템인가.
평소 쌓은 선행 덕분에 부활의 기회를 얻게 된다.

산적 떼에게 죽은 몸으로 부활하게 된 한진수.
그런데 이 몸이 전설의 명의名醫 화타?!

전란이 끊임없는 영웅들의 시대, 혼란한 후한 말.
한진수, 그는 후한 말 명의名醫 화타로서 우뚝 서려 한다…….

<삼국지연의> 속 세상에 떨어진 젊은 외과의사가 펼치는 
기상천외한 모험이 시작된다!"

description.en: Star chef Ganghyeon Lee, who has lost his sense of taste, retreats to a peaceful countryside to escape the public eye. In his grandfather's rural home, he stumbles upon a portal to another world. Taking advantage of his escape, he decides to enjoy a relaxed camping life in this new world. However, the inhabitants of this world keep showing interest in him. Will Ganghyeon be able to live a peaceful life?

Living by selling information about monsters, Maeng Siwoo is considered completely useless in the hunter industry without any standout qualities. However, he fiercely battles to provide for his sick younger sibling.

One fateful day, he is gifted a mysterious smartphone by a transcendent being within a dungeon, appointing him as the channel manager for such beings. Upon subscribing to the channel, he unlocks the ability to wield the powers of the gods.
description.pt-br:
Vivendo da venda de informações sobre monstros, Maeng Siwoo é considerado completamente inútil na indústria de caçadores, sem quaisquer qualidades de destaque. No entanto, ele luta ferozmente para sustentar seu irmão mais novo doente.

Um dia fatídico, ele recebe um misterioso smartphone de um ser transcendente dentro de uma masmorra, nomeando-o como gerente de canal de tais seres. Ao se inscrever no canal, ele desbloqueia a habilidade de exercer os poderes dos deuses.

description.en: One day, a picture book writer named Yorozu Hikaru was asked by his close online friend, Chintarou, if they could share a room together while he attended a nearby university. Although they only knew each other through online interactions, Hikaru agrees to it without much thought. However unbeknownst to Hikaru, Chintarou, despite having a male name, is actually a girl: a very well endowed girl.
description.es-la:
Un día, a un autor de libros ilustrados quién se llama Yorozu Hikaru, su amigo cercano de internet, llamado Chintarou, le pidió que le compartiera un cuarto en su casa, en lo que atendía la universidad. 
A pesar de que solo han interactuado en línea, Hikaru acepto sin pensarlo dos veces. Sin embargo y para su sorpresa, Chintarou, a pesar de tener un nombre masculino, es en realidad una chica: Una chica muy atractiva.
description.pt-br: Um dia, um escritor de ilustrador de livros chamado Yorozu Hiraku foi convidado pelo seu amigo próximo, Chintarou, se eles pudessem dividir um quarto juntos enquanto ele frequentava uma universidade próxima. Embora eles só se conhecessem através de interações online, Hikaru concorda com isso sem pensar muito. No entanto, sem o conhecimento de Hikaru, Chintarou, apesar de ter um nome masculino, é na verdade uma menina: uma garota muito bem dotada.

A little ecchi comedy where you are being kept by a cool, beautiful girl! When you woke up, you found yourself as the pet dog of a girl named Inukai-san! At school, Inukai-san has no expression on her face, but she's a dog lover who loves her dog to pieces! She loves dogs so much that she's going to turn you into a real dog, body and soul! An erotic comedy that makes you stop being human!  
 
- [Manga Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/inuninattara)
description.pt-br:
Uma pequena comédia ecchi onde você está sendo cuidado por uma garota legal e bonita! 

Quando você acordou, você se viu como o cachorro de estimação de uma garota chamada Inukai-san! Na escola, Inukai-san não tem nenhuma expressão no rosto, mas ela adora cachorros! Ela ama tanto cachorros que vai transformar você em um cão, de corpo e alma! 

Uma comédia erótica que faz você querer deixar de ser humano!

description.en:
That asshole is back as an entirely new level of asshole!   
  
In her final year of middle school, Hwang Miae is stuck with Kim Cheol, a boy she met briefly years ago - he's her classmate… and her neighbor. Now the other kids keep calling them a couple! In a flurry of uneasiness, Cheol starts to avoid Miae like the plague.   
  
You bastard! Do you think you're the only one going through this?   
  
But it doesn't stop there. Destiny won't leave them alone as Kim Cheol and Hwang Miae keep seeing each other everywhere… causing even more trouble. As strange friends intrude on their relationship, Miae experiences puberty the right way…   
  
A new project of <Cheese In The Trap> author Soonkki!
description.fr: Octobre 1998, Mi-Ae est juste une collégienne normale qui fait de son mieux pour mener une vie relativement tranquille à l'école. Elle aime lire des bandes dessinées, écouter le groupe pop «The Fire Boys», et faire du karaoké. Un jour, un garçon qu'elle connaissait est transféré dans son école et commence à causer des problèmes. Sauf que peu importe ce qu'elle fait, il semblerait qu'il n'apprécie pas les efforts de Mi-Ae pour apprendre à mieux le connaître. Ça veut dire quoi au juste ?!

After school, he witnesses his usually quiet female classmate Sado Mitsuki, tormenting their teacher Tamura in a very sadistic way! The perfect student council president gets caught up in Sado-san's secret fetish!
description.ja: 文武両道、容姿端麗、パーフェクトな生徒会長を演じ切る男、土御門聖。そんな聖が放課後に見てしまったのは、いつもはおとなしいクラスメイト・佐渡さんがドSに教師をいじめる姿だった――！佐渡の秘められし性癖に、完璧な生徒会長が巻き込まれていく…！人には言えないコトがあるアナタに贈る、異色ラブコメ！
description.es-la:
Tsuchimikado Hijiri es un hombre que desempeña el papel del perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil, con su buena apariencia y excelentes calificaciones tanto en la escuela como en los deportes.  Después de la escuela, es testigo de cómo su normalmente tranquila compañera de clase, Sado Mitsuki, atormenta a su maestro Tamura de una manera muy sádica.  ¡El perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil queda atrapado en el fetiche secreto de Sado-san!

 ¡Esta es una comedia romántica inusual para aquellos que tienen cosas que no pueden contarles a los demás!

Kumagai Hinano, a regular office worker, relieves her stress with baths, alcohol, and Vtubing! She is a streamer of video games. Her favorite Vtuber is Emori Ato, a character with a seductive and sexy voice that just makes one melt!

As chance would have it, Hinano decided to collaborate with her fave. When she went to meet up with her, the person waiting for her was...?!

The story of a tired office worker Vtuber and a mysterious JK onee-san who collaborate with each other in a very exciting way.

普通の会社員、熊谷雛乃【くまがい ひなの】26歳のストレス発散は、お風呂とお酒と...Vtuber！　ゲーム実況の配信なんかをやっているのだ。

description.en: After a traffic accident, Zenichi Kiyama, a humble office worker, was reincarnated as a baby in a different world called "perfect compatibility". However, the result of his attribute appraisal with crystal was "dark attribute". The worst result is that he is a demon child...! ?
description.id: Setelah kecelakaan lalu lintas, Zenichi Kiyama, seorang pekerja kantoran yang rendah hati, bereinkarnasi sebagai bayi di dunia berbeda yang disebut "kompatibilitas sempurna". Namun, hasil apresiasi atributnya dengan kristal adalah "atribut hitam". .! ?
description.ja: ブラック企業に勤めるサラリーマンの木山全一は交通事故を境に異世界に赤子として転生する。神様曰く、その世界は“相性バッチリ”とのこと。希望に満ちた異世界生活が始まるはずだったが、水晶による属性鑑定を行った結果、魔族の証である《闇属性》を持って産まれたことがわかってしまい…!?

altTitles.en: Fabulous Beasts
There Are Beasts

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

altTitles.ja: アリスさんちの囲炉裏端

altTitles.th: มื้ออุ่นหน้าเตาแห่งบ้านคุณอลิซ

altTitles.en: By The Hearth At Alice-san's Home
By the Furnace of Miss Alice’s House

description.en:
After ten years, Alice returns to her hometown from Tokyo to live alone in a traditional Japanese house with a sunken hearth. Harumi, her childhood friend, nervously meets her again after such a long time, but the warmth of the hearth with Alice is just as warm as it was in the past...

Next to the hearth in Miss Alice's house, let's have a leisurely meal together.
description.pt-br: Depois de 10 anos, Alice volta de Tóquio para a sua cidade natal e mora sozinha em uma antiga casa tradicional Japonesa com lareira. Harumi, um amigo de infância, estava animado para se encontrar novamente depois de muito tempo, mas o calor da lareira com Alice continua tão quente quanto no passado...

title.en: Tenkuu no Shiro o Moratta no de Isekai de Tanoshiku Asobitai

altTitles.ja-ro: Tenkuu no Shiro wo Moratta node Isekai de Tanoshiku Asobitai

altTitles.ja: 天空の城をもらったので異世界で楽しく遊びたい

altTitles.ko: 천공의 성을 받았으니 이세계에서 즐겁게 놀고싶다

altTitles.zh: 带着天空城遨游异世界

altTitles.fr: Je veux jouer et être heureux car j’ai eu le château celeste

altTitles.en: I Want to Play Happily Because I Got the Heavenly Castle

altTitles.pt-br: Quero jogar feliz em outro mundo porque tenho um castelo celestial

description.en:
An angel made a mistake, resulting in Shiihara Daiki’s death. In order to hide the mistake, he was then sent to a different world. The angel will grant him one wish as a payment for keeping it a secret. Daiki asked for a Heavenly Castle floating in the sky without hesitation.  
Suddenly a floating castle appeared in the new world, which causes confusion amongst the people. They attempt to contact Daiki in various ways. A country tries to steal it by force, while another seeks to befriend him. What in the world would Daiki do?
description.fr:
Un ange fit une erreur qui provoqua la mort de Shiihara Daiki. Pour cacher cette erreur, il fut envoyé dans un monde différent. L’ange lui accorda un vœu en tant que payement pour qu’il garde cela secret. Daiki demanda pour un château céleste qui flotte dans le ciel sans hésitation.
Soudainement, un château flottant apparut dans le nouveau monde, ce qui causa une confusion parmi les populations. Ils essayèrent de contacter Daiki de plusieurs manières. Un pays essaye de le voler de force, pendant qu’un autre tente d’être amis avec lui. Que va donc faire Daiki ?
 




---

- Site officiel (anglais): <https://over-lap.co.jp/narou/865544077/>

title.en: Zatsuyo Gakari Ken Shien Jutsu Shi Ha Party Tsuiho Ni Akogareru ~Seken Ha Tsuiho Boomnanoni, Ore Wo Kadai Hyoka Suru Party Member Tachi Ga Kesshite Tebanaso to Shitekurenai~

altTitles.ja: 雑用係兼支援術師はパーティー追放に憧れる～世間は追放ブームなのに、俺を過大評価するパーティーメンバーたちが決して手放そうとしてくれない～

altTitles.en: The Support Mage Yearns for Party Banishment: The World Is in a Banishment Boom, but the Party Members Who Think Too Highly of Me Never Want to Let Me Go

altTitles.es: El Encargado de los Deberes y Mago de Apoyo Anhela ser Expulsado del Grupo ~Aunque el Mundo Está en un Boom de Expulsiones, los Miembros del Grupo que me Sobreestiman no me Dejarán ir~

description.en: "Stormbreaker," an up-and-coming party of young adventurers, is making waves in the dungeon conquest world with its record-breaking speed. Amidst this, Monog, who works as a handyman and a support mage, begins to doubt whether he will be expelled from "Stormbreaker" due to the recent "Attacker Supremacy" trend. However, the other members have no intention of kicking him out. In fact, they are the complete opposite...? Is the negative handyman actually a genius(?) support mage?
description.es: El grupo de aventureros jóvenes y prometedores 'Stormbreaker' está causando sensación al progresar en la conquista del calabozo a una velocidad récord. En medio de esto, Monogu, quien trabaja en tareas generales y también es un mago de apoyo, se siente cada vez más paranoico debido al actual 'atacante supremacista' que prevalece, temiendo ser expulsado de 'Stormbreaker'. Sin embargo, los miembros no tienen intenciones de expulsarlo, ¡y de hecho, algo totalmente opuesto...? ¡El despectivo asistente resulta ser un genio mago de apoyo! Junto a los miembros con personalidades únicas y adorables, ¡apuntemos a convertirnos en el grupo más fuerte! ¡Desde 'Novela Web', una historia de aventuras juveniles y harem!
description.ja: 新進気鋭の若手パーティー「ストームブレイカー」は、最速記録でダンジョン攻略を進める今話題の冒険者集団だ。そんな中、雑用係兼支援術師のモノグは昨今の「アタッカー至上主義」により、自身が「ストームブレイカー」から追放されるのでは？と疑心暗鬼に陥っていた。しかし、メンバーたちは追放しようとは思っておらず、それどころかまったくの真逆で…？ネガティブ雑用係は天才（？）支援術師だった！？

title.en: The Count’s Youngest Son Is a Gamer

altTitles.en: The Count’s Youngest Son Is a Player

description.en: Dohyeon is a top-ranking gamer in Connect, an immersive VR game that is overrun by corrupt guilds. After being murdered for discovering a mythical item, he wakes up as Lord Raul Ashton, an NPC in a closed beta version of Connect. Now the sole player in this realm, he decides to use his knowledge from his past life to prevent the downfall of House Ashton and unlock unprecedented powers. For Dohyeon, Connect is no longer just a game—it’s now his reality. Join him as he embarks on a thrilling quest to reshape his fate!

title.en: My Dearest Self With Malice Aforethought

altTitles.ru: Мое дорогое Я со злым умыслом

altTitles.ja-ro: Shinai naru Boku e Satsui o Komete

altTitles.ja: 親愛なる僕へ殺意をこめて

description.de:
Auf den ersten Blick scheint Eiji ein ganz normaler Student zu sein, doch er hat ein Geheimnis: sein verstorbener Vater war ein berüchtigter Serienmörder, der für seine extreme Grausamkeit bekannt war.
Eines Tages wacht Eiji neben einem schönen fremden Mädchen auf, das anscheinend in ihn verliebt ist und behauptet, seine Freundin zu sein, doch eigenartigerweise kann er sich nicht an sie erinnern. Die letzten Tage scheinen wie aus seinem Gedächtnis gelöscht, und es fühlt sich an, als hätte jemand anders die Kontrolle übernommen. Zur selben Zeit findet die örtliche Polizei eine aufs Übelste verstümmelte Leiche, und für sie besteht kein Zweifel: Eijis Vater ist zurück... doch kann das wirklich sein?
description.en: Urashima Eiji, a college student, goes to sleep after a fun drinking night with his friends. When he wakes up he discovers a beautiful girl next to him who treats him as if they are in a loving relationship. Later, Eiji finds out that 4 days have passed since he went out with his crew. What did he do during all that time and why does he have no memory of it? By confronting that reality, he will be caught in tragedy…
description.ne: एइजी, कलेज उमेरको कुमारले कुनै दिन प्रेमिका हुने सपना देख्छ... अनि एक दिन आफ्नो "प्रेमिका" को साथ आफ्नो ओछ्यानमा उठ्छ! त्यति मात्र होइन, उसको साथीले उसलाई बताउँछ कि ऊ झगडामा परेको छ ... र त्यो तीन दिन बितिसक्यो जुन एइजीलाई याद छैन? के अँध्यारो रहस्यहरू लुकाइरहेका छ ... एइजी आफैले?
description.ru:
Урашима Эйджи, студент колледжа, засыпает после веселой ночи с друзьями. Когда он просыпается, он обнаруживает рядом с собой красивую девушку, которая ведет себя с ним, как со своим парнем. Позже Эйджи узнает, что с того вечера прошло 3 дня. Что он делал все это время и почему не помнит ничего об этом? Столкнувшись с реальностью, он попадет в трагедию…  
  
Itou Shouta's Twitter: [@shota\_itooooo](https://twitter.com/shota_itooooo)
description.vi: Urashima Eiji, một sinh viên đại học, đi ngủ sau một đêm uống rượu vui vẻ với bạn bè. Khi tỉnh dậy, anh phát hiện ra một cô gái xinh đẹp bên cạnh, người đối xử với anh như thể họ đang trong một mối quan hệ yêu đương. Sau đó, anh phát hiện ra rằng 4 ngày đã trôi qua kể từ khi anh đi ra ngoài cùng với đám bạn của mình. Anh ấy đã làm gì trong suốt thời gian đó và tại sao anh ấy không có ký ức về nó?. Khi đối mặt với thực tế đó, anh sẽ bị cuốn vào bi kịch...

title.en: I Picked a Hammer to Save the World

altTitles.en: The Hammer

description.en:
If the name Tiny brings to mind a diminutive rogue befitting the name, think again: Tiny is a headstrong, muscle-bound warrior who would rather smash his way through obstacles with his trusty warhammer than use his brain. 

When Tiny and the legendary Ten Knights of Asran are defeated by the Demon Beastlord Gluttony, he is given a second chance at life as he is magically sent back to the past. 

Relying on his knowledge of the future, the young Tiny must right the wrongs of the past and prepare for the upcoming battle!

altTitles.en: Chronicles of the Martial God's Return
Record of Return

altTitles.ja: 武神帰還録

altTitles.en: Chronicles of a Returner

altTitles.es-la: Crónicas del Regreso del Dios marcial

altTitles.pt-br: Crônicas do Retorno do Deus Marcial

description.en:
The worst talent that no one can compete with. Unstoppable Demon God, Dan Uhyeon.

A thousand years after being sealed for the misdeed. A thousand years was enough to get rid of Dan Uhyeon's sense of superiority. A world that has changed, solitude with no one knows, and the only thing left is despondency and emptiness.

"Time goes like the wind. There's really nothing left."

A little girl who appeared in front of Dan Uhyeon lost her purpose and will to live aimlessly, Hwa Somi. For a girl who seems to have nowhere to lean on, Dan Uhyeon feels the same and gradually begins to open the door of his mind.

"I'm Dan Uhyeon. Come with me."

The story of a warrior with an icy heart and acute and pure girl The story of an unusual family's life in the midfield will warm your heart.

---
The Ultimate Martial Divine Demon, Dan Woohyun, was sealed up because he was too strong for the world to handle.  After a millennium passed by, he was released from his seal and felt like everything was meaningless as he wandered the back alleys… 

Just as he fell down because he was sick of the world, a small hand appeared in front of him.

"What's this?" asked Dan Woohyun. 

"A dumpling!" came a reply. 

This was the first time in his life that someone had been nice to him without any impure intentions, and that changed his fate. This is the chronicle of a martial god who traversed through a thousand years of time and space!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%AC%B4%EC%8B%A0%EA%B7%80%ED%99%98%EB%A1%9D/2891), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59492385)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/16060)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/112858)
description.fr: Le sixième chef-d’œuvre du genre Wuxia qui comblera vos attentes, tout comme les [Chroniques du retour du troisième degré], [La conquête de la faction céleste] et les [Chroniques des sept dragons et des sept démons]. [Chroniques du retour du Dieu Martial] Le Démon Martial Divin Ultime, Dan Woohyun, a été enfermé car il était trop fort pour que le monde puisse le gérer. Après un millénaire, il a été libéré de son sceau et avait l’impression que tout n’avait pas de sens alors qu’il errait dans les ruelles… Au moment où il s’est écroulé parce qu’il en avait marre du monde, une petite main est apparue devant lui. « Qu’est-ce que c’est ? » a demandé Dan Woohyun. « Une boulette ! » lui a été répondu. C’était la première fois de sa vie que quelqu’un était gentil avec lui sans aucune intention impure, et cela a changé son destin. Voici les chroniques d’un dieu martial qui a traversé mille ans de temps et d’espace !
description.ko:
그 누구도 맞설 수 없는 최흉의 인재(人災),

무극신마, 단우현.

이대로 영원히 세상위에 군림할 줄 알았다.
중원의 질서를 지키는 팔선들에 의해 동정호에 봉인을 당하기 전까지는….

세월이 흘러 천 년 후.
천 년이라는 시간은 단우현에게서 살심을 없애기에 충분했다.
변해버린 세상, 아는 사람이라고는 아무도 없는 고독, 남은 것은 허탈함과 공허함 뿐.

“바람이 흐르듯 세월도 흐르는구나. 정말로 아무것도 남은 것이 없어.”

목적도, 삶의 의지도 잃고 정처없이 떠도는 단우현 앞에 나타난 자그마한 소녀. 화소미.
누구에게도 기댈 곳 없어 보이는 소녀에게 단우현은 동질감을 느끼며 점점 마음의 문을 열기 시작한다.

“나는 단우현이다. 나와 함께 가자꾸나.”

얼음장 같은 마음을 가진 무신과 귀엽고 순수한 소녀의
마음을 따뜻하게 녹여 줄 평범하지 않은 한 가족의 중원 생활 이야기.

---

description.zh: 因嗜杀被封印千年的武神苏醒归来，这一世，他却只想安安静静的养女儿...
description.pt-br: Dono de um talento inigualável, Dan Woohyeon. Ele pensou que governaria o mundo eternamente, até que foi selado. Milhares de anos se passaram. O mundo mudou e as únicas coisas que restaram foram o desespero e o vazio. “À medida que o vento flui, o tempo também. Realmente não há mais nada.” Uma garotinha aparece na frente de Dan Woohyeon, que não perdeu o propósito nem a vontade de viver.  Dan Woohyeon sente-se unido com uma garota que parece não ter ninguém em quem se apoiar e gradualmente começa a abrir as portas do seu coração. “Meu nome é Dan Woohyeon. Quer vir comigo?” Começa a jornada de um deus marcial com um coração gelado e uma garota fofa e pura.

altTitles.ja: 檻ノ中のソリスト
Soloist in a cage

altTitles.en: Soloist in A Cage
Soloist of the Prison

description.ar: في سجن كبير جدا لدرجة تسميته بالمدينة، يتجمع شتى أنواع المجرمين. و بسبب جدرانه الغير قابلة للاختراق استمرت ساكنة السجن بالنمو. و بين كل هذا و ذاك شقيقان، فتاة صغيرة و طفل رضيع. ما هو مصيرهما يا ترى في هذه المدينة البائسة و الباردة؟ قصة من الأمل و النضال تبدأ الآن. ابدأ بقراءته مترجم على مانجا العرب
description.en:
In a prison so big that it is called a city, all sorts of criminals have been amassed. Due to the inescapable walls, the population only continues to grow. Within are a pair of siblings - a young girl and a recently born boy. What will be their fate in this desolate, cold city…? A story of hope and struggle begins.
___
**Official English Volumes:** [Seven Seas](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/soloist-in-a-cage/)
description.fa: زندان‌شهر مکانی که بیش از پانصد هزار نفر زندانی را در خود جای داده است و امکان فرار از آن وجود ندارد، چرا که ساکنان آن به طور مداوم توسط هزاران نگهبان ربات تحت نظر هستند. «کلوئی» دختری هفت ساله، تمام عمرش را در این شهر دلخراش زندگی کرده است. او که توسط والدینش رها شده است، روزهای خود را با برادر کوچکش، «لوک» می‌گذراند. از آنجایی که خیابان‌ها مملو از جنایتکاران خطرناک است، او هرگز خانه را ترک نکرده و با مراقبت از برادرش هدف خود را در زندگی می یابد. یک شب، «کلوئی» پس از اینکه متوجه شد همسایگانش در حال تلاش برای فرار هستند، مخفیانه آنها را در حالی که «لوک» را حمل می‌کند، تعقیب می‌کند. در حین فرار همه چیز بهم می‌ریزد و او از برادرش جدا می شود ...
description.es-la: En una prisión tan grande que se llama ciudad, se han acumulado todo tipo de criminales. Debido a los ineludibles muros, la población no hace más que crecer. Dentro hay un par de hermanos: una niña y un niño recién nacido. ¿Cuál será su destino en esta desolada y fría ciudad? Comienza una historia de esperanza y lucha.

altTitles.ja: ギャルに優しいオタク君

altTitles.en: Otaku x Gal
Otaku-kun Who's Kind to Gyaru
Otaku-kun Who's Kind to Gals
Gal-Friendly Otaku-kun

description.en: Otakura is a high school boy who's clearly an otaku, and Narumi is a high school gal. Normally, these two polar opposites would never cross paths, even at school. But by a strange coincidence, it turns out Otakura is able to use his inherently handy nature to help out Narumi with her own hobby-related requests, one after another?
description.id:
Odakura, seorang anak SMA yang terlihat otaku, dan Narumi, seorang gadis SMA yang terlihat seperti seorang gal. Awalnya, mereka adalah dua kutub yang berlawanan yang tidak akur di sekolah, tetapi secara kebetulan, Odakura menggunakan ketangkasan alaminya untuk mengabulkan permintaan Narumi satu demi satu!? 

Komedi romantis remaja sekolahmu♪
description.ja:
見た目がオタクな男子高校生の小田倉と、ギャルな女子高生の鳴海。
本来は学校でも交わらない真逆のタイプの二人だったけれど、ひょんなことから小田倉は持ち前の手先の器用さで、鳴海の趣味に関するお願い事を次々と叶えていって!?

ギャルの趣味を理解するオタク君の学園青春ラブコメディー♪

---

Mitame ga otakuna danshi kōkōsei no Odagura to, gyaruna mesukōsei no Narumi. Honrai wa gakkō demo majiwaranai magyaku no taipu no futaridattakeredo, hyon'nakotokara Odagura wa mochimae no tesaki no kiyō-sa de, Narumi no shumi ni kansuru o negaigoto o tsugitsugi to kanaete itte!? 

Gyaru no shumi o rikai suru otaku-kun no gakuen seishun rabukomedī ♪
description.pt-br: Odakura, um garoto do ensino médio que parece um otaku, e Narumi, uma garota do ensino médio que se parece com uma gal. Originalmente, eles eram polares opostos que não se davam bem na escola, mas por acaso, Odakura usou sua destreza natural para conceder os desejos da Narumi um após o outro!? Sua comédia romântica escolar da juventude.

title.en: Onna Chara de Isekai Teni shite Cheatppoi kedo Zako Chara na no de Medatazu Heiwa na Shomin wo Mezashimasu!

altTitles.ja: 女キャラで異世界転移してチートっぽいけど雑魚キャラなので目立たず平和な庶民を目指します！

altTitles.ja-ro: Onna Chara de Isekai Ten'i shite Cheatppoi kedo Zako Chara na no de Medatazu Heiwa na Shomin o Mezashimasu!

altTitles.en: After Reincarnating in Another World as My Sort of Cheat but Small Fry Female Character I will Strive to Live a Peaceful Life of an Ordinary Person!

altTitles.hu: Olyan Női Karakterként Kerülök Egy Másik Világba, Akinek Ugyan Vannak Különleges Képességei, De Mivel Egy Jelentéktelen Karakter Vagyok, Megpróbálok Nem Feltűnni És Békés Hétköznapi Életet Élni!

description.en: A little weary salaryman. One day, after waking up… he found himself in another world in the body of a female character, Susie, from the MMORPG he liked to play. Confused, he tried an attack… and made all the monsters flee to the place people live, afraid of his destructive power that’s able to smash a mountain. Having dealt with them, he ended up saving Howard, a local tribune who invited his savior to the village, but…
description.es: Un asalariado un poco cansado. Un día, tras despertarse... se encontró en otro mundo en el cuerpo de un personaje femenino, Susie, del MMORPG al que le gustaba jugar. Confundido, intentó un ataque... e hizo que todos los monstruos huyeran al lugar donde vive la gente, temerosos de su poder destructivo, capaz de aplastar una montaña. Tras enfrentarse a ellos, acabó salvando a Howard, un magistrado local que había invitado a su héroe al pueblo, pero...
description.hu:
Egy kimerült irodai dolgozó. Egy nap, amikor felébred, azt veszi észre, hogy egy másik világba került, és abban a női karakterben van, amelyet az általa játszott online játékban használt, Suzy néven. Bár kezdetben össze van zavarodva, támadásai hatalmas pusztító erővel bírnak, olyannyira, hogy még a hegyek alakját is megváltoztatja, és veszélyes vadállatokat űz a közeli faluba. Miközben segít Howardnak, a falusiak védelmezőjének, a vadállatok elleni küzdelemben, meghívást kap a faluba. Azonban...

Egy 32 éves férfi... egy online játék világában lánnyá válva próbál boldogulni!? Célja egy egyszerű, békés élet megteremtése a falusi környezetben. A kaland most kezdődik!
description.ja:
お疲れ気味のサラリーマン。ある日、目が覚めると...やりこんでいたネットゲームの女キャラ・スージィの姿で異世界転移していた。とまどいながらも攻撃を放つと...なぜか山の形を変えてしまうほどの破壊力で、人里のほうに魔獣を散らしてしまう。そしてその対処をしていた護民官ハワードを助けたことをきっかけに、村に招かれることになるのだが――。

32歳のおっさんが...ネトゲの世界で女の子として生きていく!? 目指せ庶民派スローライフ、開幕!!
description.vi: Một anh nhân viên làm công ăn lương bình thường.  Bỗng một ngày nọ, sau khi tỉnh dậy… anh thấy mình ở một thế giới khác trong cơ thể của một nhân vật nữ, Susie, trong game MMORPG mà anh rất thích. Bối rối, Anh đấm hết lũ quái xung quanh… và khiến tất cả quái vật chạy trốn đến nơi con người sinh sống trong sự sợ hãi trước sức mạnh hủy diệt có thể đập nát cả một ngọn núi của mình. Xử lý xong đám quái vật, anh cứu giúp ông bác Howard đang bị lũ quái bao vậy, Howard ngỏ lời mời anh đến làng, thế rồi...
description.es-la: Un asalariado un poco cansado. Un día, tras despertarse... se encontró en otro mundo en el cuerpo de un personaje femenino, Susie, del MMORPG al que le gustaba jugar. Confundido, intentó un ataque... e hizo que todos los monstruos huyeran al lugar donde vive la gente, temerosos de su poder destructivo, capaz de aplastar una montaña. Tras enfrentarse a ellos, acabó salvando a Howard, un magistrado local que había invitado a su héroe al pueblo, pero...
description.pt-br: Um assalariado um pouco cansado. Um dia, ao acordar… ele se viu em outro mundo no corpo de uma personagem feminina, Susie, do MMORPG que ele gostava de jogar. Confuso, ele tentou um ataque… e fez todos os monstros fugirem para o lugar onde as pessoas vivem, com medo de seu poder avassalador que é capaz de destruir uma montanha. Depois disso, ele acabou salvando Howard, um tribuno local que convidou seu salvador para a vila, mas…

description.en:
300 years ago, the invincible warrior Hyeon-oh Kim brought down the Tower of the End, preventing the world’s demise. Though he should have died the moment the Tower of the End collapsed, Hyeon-oh is reborn 300 years later in the body of a 17-year-old boy named Juhyeok Kim.

Meanwhile, he discovers the existence of the Constellations, who were once his disciples 300 years ago but were born during the time when he did not exist in this world. Will he be able to find them again and train them?

title.en: There Are No Bad Heroes in This World

description.en:
Choi Hyun-seok, who was once the mightiest man, begins a new life as a hero in another world after his death. 

"A hero who monopolizes wealth, fame, and beautiful women!" 

Dreaming of a glorious future, he arrives in the other world, only to encounter a monstrous beast with a head one size larger than his own. 

The monster, a high-ranking officer of the Demon King’s army, asked: "Hero? Are you the so-called hero?" 

"Uh… I guess I’m the hero…?"

And so, hell began.
description.ko:
세상에서 가장 강한 남자라 불렸던 사나이.세계 최대 격투기 리그의 헤비급 챔피언.최강의 남자였던 최현석은 죽음 이후 이세계의 용사로서 새로운 삶을 시작한다.

'부! 명예! 미녀를 독차지하는 용사!'

찬란한 미래를 꿈꾸며 이세계로 이동한 그가 조우한 것은 자신보다 머리 하나는 더 큰 근육질의 소대가리를 괴물.마왕군의 간부였던 괴물이 물었다.

"용사? 네가 용사라는 거냐?"
“어... 용사일걸요...?”

그렇게 지옥이 시작됐다.

title.en: The Banished Court Magician Aims to Become the Strongest

altTitles.ja: 味方が弱すぎて補助魔法に徹していた宮廷魔法師、追放されて最強を目指す

altTitles.ja-ro: Mikata ga Yowa Sugite Hojo Mahou ni Toushite Ita Kyuutei Mahoushi, Tsuihou Sarete Saikyou wo Mezasu

altTitles.zh-hk: 我方太弱而徹底變成輔助魔法的宮廷魔法師，被退隊後以最強為目標

altTitles.en: A Court Magician, Who Was Focused on Supportive Magic Because His Allies Were Too Weak, Aims to Become the Strongest After Being Banished
Story of Lasting Period

altTitles.ko: 아군이 너무 약해 보조 마법으로 일관하던 궁정 마법사, 추방당해서 최강을 노린다

description.en:
“This party doesn’t need an incompetent magician who can only use supportive magic. You’re fired, Alec Yugret.” Suddenly, Alec, a court magician who had joined the crown prince’s party to help him conquer dungeons, was banished from the party. And not just the party, but the crown prince’s harassment has banished him from the royal palace as well, and a friend from the “magic academy” approached Alec, who was at his wit’s end. “Hey, Alec. Do you want to try to conquer the dungeon with us again?” And so, together with the friends he used to party with, Alec begins his second journey in life.

This is the adventure story of a former court magician who had been abandoned.
Four years ago, the “Lasting Period,” a party of four that had been called “legendary,” has gradually spread its name around the world.
description.ja:
王太子を陰ながら支えてきたのに、能無し呼ばわりされ追放宣告された宮廷魔法師アレク。魔法学院時代の仲間・天才補助魔法師のヨルハに誘われたことで、かつてダンジョン踏破記録を打ち立てた伝説のパーティーが再集結することに！

補助魔法しか使えない能無しは必要ない。オマエはクビだ」　王太子を陰ながら支える宮廷魔法師・アレクに突き付けられた追放宣告。職を失った彼の前に現れたのは、かつての仲間で天才補助魔法師の少女・ヨルハ。「キミの力が必要なんだ。また始めよう…あの日の続きを」　かくして魔法学院時代、ダンジョン踏破記録を打ち立てた伝説のパーティーが再集結――！

altTitles.ja: コハエースＥＸ

description.en:
A Holy Grail War has broken out in Koha-Ace!

After managing to avoid getting axed again and again, some miracle has allowed for a third volume of Koha-Ace! The mysterious new Servant designed by Takashi Takeuchi, Sakura Saber, is a storm of romance who will play an active role! We'll show you the real power of Koha-Ace. (Third Volume of Koha-Ace, following Koha-Ace+)

altTitles.ja: ヤニねこ

altTitles.en: Tar Cat

description.en: A chain-smoking catgirl struggles with her cigarette addiction.
description.ja: マナーやモラルなんて関係ねえ！クズねこの送るヤニまみれでお下品な日常をご覧ください。一応、妹とか普通にかわいいキャラもでてくるから！単行本でしか見れない貴重な喫煙シーンとかたぶん描くんで、予約してくれたらありがてーにゃ(笑)

title.en: Ano Otome Game wa Oretachi ni Kibishii Sekai desu

altTitles.ja: あの乙女ゲーは俺たちに厳しい世界です

altTitles.ja-ro: Ano Otomege wa Ore-tachi ni Kibishii Sekai desu

altTitles.en: Trapped in a Dating Sim: Otome Games Are Tough For Us, Too!
The World of Otome Games is Tough For Mobs: Marie Route
The World of That Otome Game is Tough for Us

description.en:
Leon was reincarnated in the world of an otome game that he was forced by his sister to conquer just before his death. 

He tried to live a peaceful life as a mob character, but he encountered a scene where a female student ignored the flow of the story and tried to become the main character. Leon ended up seizing Marie, a girl who had a similar atmosphere to his sister from his previous life, and succeeded in thwarting the scheme. 

It should have have been the right choice... but why was he feeling uneasy about it?
description.ru:
Леон переродился мобом в мире «отомэ-игры», невольное прохождение которой спихнула на него младшая сестра. Полный отчаяния в мире превосходства женщин, он тем не менее пытается вести спокойную жизнь, нигде не отсвечивая.

В то же время Мария, также переродившаяся в этом мире, строит планы по заполучению положения главной героини и созданию «обратного гарема» с принцем и другими парнями, влюбившихся в неё с первого взгляда, но…

Какая же судьба уготована Леону и Марии, кто сделали лишь один выбор, отличающийся от изначального?!
description.pt-br: Leon foi reencarnado no mundo de um Otome Game que sua irmã o forçou a jogar pouco antes de morrer. Ele tentou viver uma vida pacífica como um personagem secundário, mas acabou encontrando uma cena em que uma estudante feminina ignorou o curso da história e tentou se tornar a personagem principal. Leon acabou capturando Marie, uma garota que tinha uma atmosfera semelhante à de sua irmã de sua vida anterior, e teve sucesso em frustrar o esquema. Deveria ter sido a escolha certa... mas por que ele estava se sentindo inquieto com isso?

title.en: Boku no Suki na Hito ga Suki na Hito

altTitles.ja: ぼくの好きな人が好きな人

altTitles.zh-hk: 我喜歡的人所喜歡的人

altTitles.en: My Crush's Crush

description.en: This story begins when the protagonist, a boy named Sora Akizuki, confesses his love to Miya Fuwa, a girl he has been in love with for a long time, and is rejected. When Sora learns that Miya likes someone else, he visits the dubious “Trialing Club," of which he is president, and tries to find out if he is the right person for her. The first episode shows the reality of the Trialing Club, whose activities one cannot imagine from its name, and the reason why its president, Suzukaze, created the club.
description.ru: Эта история начинается с того, что главный герой, мальчик по имени Сора Акидзуки, признается в любви Мие Фува, девушке, в которую он давно влюблен, и получает отказ. Когда Сора узнает, что Мия любит другого, он посещает сомнительный “Эксперементальный клуб”, президентом которого является этот незнакомец, и пытается выяснить, подходит ли он ей. В первом эпизоде показана реальность Эксперементального клуба, деятельность которого невозможно представить, исходя из его названия, и причина, по которой его президент Судзукадзе создал этот клуб.
description.vi:
Câu chuyện này bắt đầu khi nhân vật chính, một chàng trai tên Sora Akizuki, thú nhận tình yêu của mình với Miya Fuwa, một cô gái mà anh đã yêu từ lâu nhưng bị từ chối. Khi Sora biết rằng Miya thích một người khác, anh ấy đã đến thăm “Câu lạc bộ thử việc” đáng ngờ mà anh ấy là chủ tịch, và cố gắng tìm hiểu xem anh ấy có phải là người phù hợp với cô ấy không.
Tập đầu tiên cho thấy thực tế của Câu lạc bộ Thử nghiệm, những hoạt động mà người ta không thể tưởng tượng được từ cái tên của nó, và lý do tại sao chủ tịch của nó, Suzukaze, lại thành lập câu lạc bộ.
description.es-la: Está historia empieza cuando el protagonista, un chico llamado Sora Akizuki, confiesa su amor a Miya Fuwa, una chica de la que está enamorado desde hace tiempo, y es rechazado. Cuando Sora se entera de que a Miya le gusta otra persona, visita el dudoso "Club de Ensayos", del que es presidente, e intenta averiguar si es la persona adecuada para ella. El primer episodio muestra la realidad del Club de Ensayos, cuyas actividades no se puede imaginar por su nombre, y la razón por la que su presidente, Suzukaze, creó el club.
description.pt-br: A história começa quando o protagonista, um garoto chamado Sora Akizuki, confessa seu amor a Miya Fuwa, uma garota por quem está apaixonado há muito tempo, entretanto, ele é rejeitado. Quando Sora descobre que Miya gosta de outra pessoa e que essa pessoa faz parte de um clube duvidoso, Sora sai em busca para tentar descobrir se é alguém confiável.

altTitles.en: Please Have a Meal !
Eat and Go!

altTitles.ja: お食事はいかがですか？

description.en:
When he lost his ability to taste and smell, Lee Rim’s life as a chef ended. Just as he’s sinking deeper and deeper into depression, Rim discovers [Real], an incredibly immersive VR game that simulates all five senses. There, he’s able to regain his senses of taste and smell. Not only that, but he can cook, too! Although he does need to hunt his own monster ingredients down… Now, Rim is here to cook up delicious food, hunt some dangerous monsters, and maybe even build a whole new legacy along the way. Welcome to Lee Rim’s new life as “Rice”, the gourmet gamer!

description.ja:
生まれ持ったセンスと磨き上げた才能のおかげで前途有望な料理長だった川越。ある日、不意の事故で一時的なものでありながらも味覚と嗅覚を失ってしまう。しばらく立ち直れず引きこもっていたが、現実よりもリアルと巷で噂のVRゲーム「リアル」で感覚を取り戻したかのような臨場感溢れる経験をする。「リアル」に食材を見て、触れて、嗅いで、味わいながら料理人としての道を進めて行く。その経験を活かし、実生活でも少しずつ前を向き始める川越しのこれからはどうなる!? 笑いあり涙ありの新感覚グルメマンガ！

Ли Ирим был лучшим шеф-поваром, пока он не попал в аварию и не потерял вкус.

altTitles.en: Chasing After Aoi Koshiba
If I Could See Koshiba Aoi Today.

altTitles.zh: 今日，若是能与小柴葵相遇

altTitles.ja: 今日、小柴葵に会えたら。

description.en: The latest manga by the creator of Masamune-Kun's Revenge. The story of Kyo, Koshiba Aoi ni Aetera follows Sahoko, a girl who values what others think of her, and Aoi, a girl who is able to let out her true self without caring about what others think. To get closer to Aoi whose candid air appeared shining, the action that Sahoko takes to get closer is… a kiss.
description.pt: A história segue Sahoko, uma típica garota do colegial, que conhece Aoi, uma típica garota espontânea do ensino médio. A história se desenvolve à medida que elas passam sua fugaz juventude no ensino médio. Mesmo após se tornarem adultas, seus sentimentos não desapareceram e continuam brilhando como nunca.

altTitles.en: Even 'Used Goods' Wants to Experience Love!
Even If It Is Second Hand, I Want to Fall in Love!

altTitles.pt-br: Eu não preciso de uma heroína real

altTitles.ru: Даже использованный товар желает испытать любовь

altTitles.th: มือสองแล้วทําไมถ้าใจคิดจะรัก

altTitles.ja: 現実の彼女はいりません!

description.en: Aramiya Seiichi is an ordinary high school eroge otaku who's given up all hope on girls in the 3D world due to a certain incident. One day, after he's bought a bunch of new material in consequence of experiencing the frustration of a perfect eroge character turning out to be used goods, he encounters a delinquent-like-looking girl being about to get raped by a bunch of guys. By mere chance, he rescues her. Days later, when school starts again, it turns out to have been his classmate, Ayame, a feared delinquent girl who's got all kind of rumors about her, especially that she's used goods. And it appears that she's set on becoming his ideal girl to make him fall for her.
description.ja: 三次元に興味ナシのオタクな高校生・新宮清一は、ひょんなことから学校一の不良少女・綾女古都子に告白される。当然の如くこれを断固拒否！　……した清一だったが、古都子は「じゃあ、お前の理想になってやるよ！」とメインヒロインのようなツインテ美少女に変貌して、強引なアプローチで迫り始め…？
description.pt: Aramiya Seiichi é um estudante ordinário… Um otaku dos eroges que perdeu todas as esperanças nas garotas em 3D devido um certo incidente. Um dia, após ele comprar alguns materiais novos devido uma frustração em consequência de uma experiência frustrante com uma "personagem perfeita" de um eroge, ele encontra uma garota delinquente prestes a ser estuprada por um grupo de homens. Por um acaso ele acaba salvando ela, e por este acaso a sua vida acaba mudando completamente...
description.ru: Когда Сейчи учился в младших классах, он получил психическую травму из-за некой девушки. С тех самых пор, он с недоверием относится к девушкам, и испытывает отвращение к не девственницам. Сейчас Сейчи эроге-отаку, ученик старшей школы, однажды вечером он оказывается свидетелем попытки изнасилования девушки группой людей, случайно привлекая внимания насильников, он использует смекалку и успешно спасает себя и девушку. Девушка оказывается известной хулиганкой, и о ней часто ходят не очень хорошие слухи, а что не менее важно, девушка эта – одноклассница Сейчи, Аямэ. После того дня, она влюбляется в главного героя, и решает добиться его расположения любым способом. Видя потуги девушки, учительница Сейчи просит его помочь Аямэ стать нормальной девушкой, на что тот неохотно соглашается. Так и начинается история о парне, который пытается исправить хулиганку, попутно устраняя все нажитые ею слухи, и о девушке, которая хочет любви.

title.en: Saenai Riman to Yankee Joshi Kousei

altTitles.en: Dull Businessman and Naughty High School Girl

altTitles.ja: 冴えないリーマンとヤンキー女子高生

description.en: Yamada Hiroyuki is 26 years old, has a stable job, is an otaku, but is overwhelmed by the ideas and thoughts of his family, i.e. marriage and criticism over his childish hobbies. He decides to leave the house and go to live in an apartment, alone and happy, but the perfect image he had in mind when he moved in was destroyed when he learned that his neighbor is a yankee schoolgirl. However he soon discovers her real personalty is quite awkward and very tender. Will the story of these two advance for the better?
description.pt-br: Yamada Hiroyuki tem 26 anos, tem um emprego estável, é um otaku, oprimido pelas ideias e pensamentos de sua família (quando você se casa? Você ainda assiste animes na sua idade?) Ele decide sair de casa e ir morar em um apartamento, sozinho e feliz, mas a imagem perfeita que ele tinha em mente quando se mudou, foi destruída quando soube que sua vizinha é uma yankee (delinquente) e ao mesmo tempo uma colegial, logo ele descobre que aquela garota rude e desbocada é alguém desajeitada, muito terna e muito fofa. A história desses dois jovens avançará para melhor?

altTitles.ja: あの子の子ども

altTitles.en: That Girl's Child
Her Child

description.en:
“I think I might be pregnant.”

Sachi, a high school girl, has a childhood sweetheart, Takara.
One day, feeling something wrong with her health, she buys a pregnancy test.
Using the test at a diner in a town far from home, she sees two lines that indicate a "positive" result…
___
**Won the 47th Annual Kodansha Manga Award for Shoujo in 2023.**

altTitles.ja: いつか、家族になるまで

description.en: The three lived together under a single roof. Takaomi is a single father, raising his only son. For some reason, he is persistently being hit on by his colleague, Nomura, who so happens to be able to do both work and housework. Taking overly good care of them, Nomura repeatedly visits Takaomi’s house uninvited and proposes that Takaomi should go out with him, telling him all about the advantages of doing so. Takaomi was perplexed since he’s never even dated another man before. But as they spent more time together, going out for meals and visiting amusement parks, Takaomi came to realise that he enjoyed the time spent together as a three and that it felt precious to him… A heart-warming BL between a flawless younger salaryman and a single father moved by affection.

altTitles.en: Girl Meets Bear

altTitles.ja: くまみこ

altTitles.en: Bear Shrine Maiden

description.en: In the deep regions of the Touhouku area, the comedic story of the miko of bears, 14-year-old Machi, and her childhood friend, the talking bear Natsu, takes place as Machi struggles to qualify for city-life with Natsu's assistance.

title.en: Shinyuu ni Imouto(?) ga Ita Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 親友に妹(?)がいた話

altTitles.ja-ro: Shinyuu ni Imouto ( ? ) ga Ita Hanashi

altTitles.en: A Story about How My Friend Had a Little Sister(?)

altTitles.ja: エロイカより愛をこめて

description.en:
What happens when a gay art thief and a conservative NATO officer cross paths? Disaster, of course. 
Dorian is an aristocrat, a thief, and a hedonist; Klaus is a duty-driven espionage agent with no patience for fools.

Follow them as they chase each other across the globe – from Britain to Baghdad, from Alaska to Alexandria or Moscow to Madrid. 
Spectacular locations and non-stop adventures await!
